channel.title: development on Seven steps

item.title: Benefits of a rapid test suite
item.description: The value of a rapid test suite Developers and codebases The bare minimum required of a developer is "make this change without breaking anything else in the code", and if you've been around software development for any period of time, you know that's harder than it seems. Most of the time that a developer spends on any given codebase is spent on an existing codebase, adding new features on top of existing code.
